full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 OPTIONAL FORM NO. 10 5010-107 MAY 1962 EDITION GSA GEN. REG NO. 27 UNITED STATES GOVERNMENT Memorandum A14 415544 TO : Chief Patrol DATE: October 21, 1966 El Paso, Texas 24 FROM : A. G. Vaughan, Acting PATROL District.Director 1966 Christ El Paso, Texas SUBJECT: Luis Meza Corrales There is attached file relating to the subject. Your attention is called to memorandum for the file dated October 20, 1966, wherein Mr. Richard Montoya, a minister of the gospel, is re- questing information concerning the possible United States citizenship of the subject. It will be appreciated if you will have your Carlsbad Unit con- duct appropriate investigation of the subject's status and ad- vise this office of the results thereof. It is further requested that your officers advise Mr. Montoya as to the subject's status. Attachment time SBI Carlobal 10.04.66 How RECEIVED Section NUV 2 1965 11-1-66 for I-213 dated 11-1-66 g Rasos I Subject regaln / Buy U.S. Savings Bonds Regularly on the Payroll Savings Plan
